description: Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC), has a requirement for inkjet printers and related consumables over a three (3) initial period with two (2) one (1) year options to extend the contract. This Contract is for the supply, and delivery, of the equipment, as well as the necessary associated consumables on an as-and-when-requested basis.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** International Visa Printers (2023)

**Contract Reference:** SSC-23-00024144:T

**Modification Number:** 4

**Solicitation Number:** BPM019787/24144

**Publication Date:** November 8, 2023

**Closing Date:** November 9, 2023 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Duration:** 3 years with 2 additional 1-year extension options

**GSIN Classification:** N3610C (Printing Equipment)

**Location:** Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)

**Tender Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Description

Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) requires the supply and delivery of inkjet printers and related consumables on an as-and-when-requested basis. The printers and consumables must meet the mandatory technical specifications outlined in Annex A of the RFP.

## Attachments

* Amendment 004: SSC 2BP3-138368 - International Visa Printers (2023)
* RFP documents and attachments (available on the link provided)

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Katherine Ikeson
* **Email:** Not available
* **Phone:** 613-298-2147
* **Fax:** 613-123-4567
* **Address:** 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, ON K2P 2H8, Canada

## Trade Agreements

* The tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and other trade agreements listed in the tender document.

Note: I made some minor edits to the formatting of the original text to make it easier to read. The only source used for this response was the provided English text, as the French text may have been a machine translation. Please verify the accuracy of the information before sharing it with others.
